string.name: bullet_point_1
string.b: \u2022 Send Emergency messages automatically to your family/friends and the emergency centre by multiple presses on power button

string.name: bullet_point_2
string.b: \u2022 Able to send messages automatically even if there is no signal on your device

resources.string: Please grant permissions for such reasons;

string.name: permissions_string_2
string.b: *Messages - We need to access to your default SMS application in order to send messages.

string.name: permissions_string_3
string.b: *Contacts - We need to access to your contacts list so you can select your contacts.

string.name: permissions_string_4
string.b: *Location - We need to access to your GPS and enable if its disabled whenever you trigger the application send the emergency messages

resources.string: You can activate the application by pressing the power button 3 times whether the phone is locked or not then it will send the emergency message automatically.

Here you are allowed to change the options on location preferences. You can decide the interval on sending location update messages after Emergency message is been sent to allow the receiver track your location. Also, refresh Location on the home screen and save location history for cases of no network signal.
